entry.title: Sept.24
entry.content: I will regain my liberty,no matter what is the result !!! but at the same time,I realized I do something wrong.such as I put a lot of pressures on myself,I began to be pessimistic and I got a bit uptight so that I can’t put all my attention on learning.maybe I should go bed early to relax myself.Wish me can past the test.good nite.

entry.title: sept.23
entry.content: I am still fighting for the accounting eaxmination,although I’m so sleepy that I can hardly keep my eyes open……

entry.title: Sept.22
entry.content: Only have 3 days that I can liberate from the accounting examination…but I don’t know how long will I can free myself from influenza.I have a sore throat and a stuffy nose, and what’s more,I feel thirsty frequently no matter I have drunk how much water.Maybe it cause by the weather of autumn.I have to prepare some water for my sleep time,because I know the bad taste without water when I woke up with thirsty…good night.

entry.title: Sept.21
entry.content: I spend my weekend on the preparation of accounting eaxmination.I wish I won’t spend my free time on it…it puts me through hell… I will never laugh someone who had a cold in such a hot day anymore.Well, I catch a cold!!! I just hope I can sleep well with smoothly breath the whole night… good nite…
